food.description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Filet
suspicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Stir-Fried Filet
normal.description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Filet
delicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Flash-Fried Filet
special.description: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

food.name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
food.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
suspicious.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. You can barely tell where the rice noodles end and the fish begins. The soft, floppy mouthfeel is almost unbearable — how could something that looked this simple actually require so much craft?
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
normal.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
delicious.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. The sumptuous, fresh look is already enough to leave people salivating, and one bite will surely lead to another. The smooth rice noodles and tender fish grant this meal a seat at any gourmet's table, its pedestrian ingredients notwithstanding.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

food.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
food.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
suspicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Improper oil temperature control has caused the ingredients to reek of oil. Those who eat but a single bite will shake their heads and mourn the loss of the rare violetgrass used.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
normal.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
delicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. The scents of the earth, the cool shade, and the moistness of the mist have all been enjoined into this plate of freshness. Pair it with simple white rice — both your taste buds and your soul shall experience a down-to-earth satisfaction many times over.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Sunshine Sprat
food.description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sunshine Sprat
suspicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish has been fried too long, which has deprived it of all its freshness and springiness. The slightest touch with your utensils might cause it to break into small pieces.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sunshine Sprat
normal.description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sunshine Sprat
delicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Woodland Dream
special.description: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.
special.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Sweet Madame
food.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sweet Madame
suspicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Sweet Madame
normal.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Sweet Madame
delicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Dinner of Judgment
special.description: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.
special.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Tea Break Pancake
food.description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tea Break Pancake
suspicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Tea Break Pancake
normal.description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
delicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

special.name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
special.description: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

food.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
food.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
suspicious.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
normal.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
delicious.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Teyvat Charred Egg
special.description: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

food.name: Tianshu Meat
food.description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tianshu Meat
suspicious.description: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down even when wrapped in the Qingxin leaves.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Tianshu Meat
normal.description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 35% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Tianshu Meat
delicious.description: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 45% and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Triple-Layered Consommé
food.description: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Triple-Layered Consommé
suspicious.description: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Triple-Layered Consommé
normal.description: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Triple-Layered Consommé
delicious.description: A neatly-arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

food.name: Universal Peace
food.description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Universal Peace
suspicious.description: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Universal Peace
normal.description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Universal Peace
delicious.description: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Prosperous Peace
special.description: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.
special.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

food.name: Vegetarian Abalone
food.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Vegetarian Abalone
suspicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The overly thick sauce has totally covered the freshness that the ingredients should have had, and the condiment leaves your mouth dry no matter how much you wash it down with water.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Vegetarian Abalone
normal.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Vegetarian Abalone
delicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

special.name: Ghostly March
special.description: Hu Tao's specialty. The round-faced ghouls seem quite cute, squeezed into a pile as they are. But if you were to fall to temptation and try but one of them, you may yet come to regret it for a long while... After all, this plate is full of top-quality, taste-bud-blasting— Actually, what on earth is this stuff, anyway?
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

food.name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
food.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
suspicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
normal.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
delicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

ingredients.name: Almond
ingredients.description: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

ingredients.name: Bacon
ingredients.description: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

ingredients.name: Bamboo Shoot
ingredients.description: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

ingredients.name: Berry
ingredients.description: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

ingredients.name: Bird Egg
ingredients.description: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

recipes.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

ingredients.name: Butter
ingredients.description: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

ingredients.name: Cabbage
ingredients.description: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

ingredients.name: Calla Lily
ingredients.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

ingredients.name: Carrot
ingredients.description: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

ingredients.name: Cheese
ingredients.description: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

ingredients.name: Chilled Meat
ingredients.description:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

ingredients.name: Crab
ingredients.description: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

ingredients.name: Crab Roe
ingredients.description: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

ingredients.name: Cream
ingredients.description: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

ingredients.name: Fish
ingredients.description: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

ingredients.name: Flour
ingredients.description: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

ingredients.name: Fowl
ingredients.description: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

ingredients.name: Ham
ingredients.description: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

ingredients.name: Horsetail
ingredients.description: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

ingredients.name: Jam
ingredients.description: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

ingredients.name: Jueyun Chili
ingredients.description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

ingredients.name: Lotus Head
ingredients.description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

recipes.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

ingredients.name: Matsutake
ingredients.description: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

ingredients.name: Milk
ingredients.description: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

ingredients.name: Mint
ingredients.description: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

ingredients.name: Mushroom
ingredients.description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

ingredients.name: Pepper
ingredients.description: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

ingredients.name: Pinecone
ingredients.description: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

ingredients.name: Potato
ingredients.description: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

ingredients.name: Qingxin
ingredients.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

ingredients.name: Radish
ingredients.description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

ingredients.name: Raw Meat
ingredients.description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

ingredients.name: Rice
ingredients.description: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.description: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

ingredients.name: Sausage
ingredients.description: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

ingredients.name: Shrimp Meat
ingredients.description: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

ingredients.name: Small Lamp Grass
ingredients.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
source: Found in the wild at night
Recommendation: Found in the Whispering Woods

ingredients.name: Smoked Fowl
ingredients.description: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

ingredients.name: Snapdragon
ingredients.description: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

recipes.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

ingredients.name: Sweet Flower
ingredients.description: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

ingredients.name: Tofu
ingredients.description: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

ingredients.name: Violetgrass
ingredients.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

ingredients.name: Wheat
ingredients.description: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

jewels_materials.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

jewels_materials.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

jewels_materials.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

jewels_materials.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

jewels_materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
jewels_materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

jewels_materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

jewels_materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
jewels_materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

jewels_materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
jewels_materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

jewels_materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

jewels_materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

jewels_materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

jewels_materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

jewels_materials.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

jewels_materials.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "Sorry..."

jewels_materials.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

jewels_materials.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

jewels_materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

jewels_materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

jewels_materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

jewels_materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

jewels_materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

jewels_materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "My ideals have no stains."

jewels_materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

jewels_materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

jewels_materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
jewels_materials.description:
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

jewels_materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
jewels_materials.description: "Still, the winds change direction."

jewels_materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
jewels_materials.description:
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

jewels_materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
jewels_materials.description: Character Ascension Material.

local_materials.name: Calla Lily
local_materials.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

local_materials.name: Cecilia
local_materials.description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

local_materials.name: Cor Lapis
local_materials.description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

local_materials.name: Dandelion Seed
local_materials.description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

local_materials.name: Glaze Lily
local_materials.description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.
source: Recommendation: Found in Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

local_materials.name: Jueyun Chili
local_materials.description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

local_materials.name: Noctilucous Jade
local_materials.description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

local_materials.name: Philanemo Mushroom
local_materials.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
source: Found under the eaves of houses

local_materials.name: Qingxin
local_materials.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
source: Found in the heights of stone forests
Recommendation: Found in Guyun Stone Forest

local_materials.name: Silk Flower
local_materials.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
source: Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

local_materials.name: Small Lamp Grass
local_materials.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
source: Found in the wild at night
Recommendation: Found in the Whispering Woods

local_materials.name: Starconch
local_materials.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
source: Found on the beaches of Liyue

local_materials.name: Valberry
local_materials.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, the watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.

local_materials.name: Violetgrass
local_materials.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

local_materials.name: Windwheel Aster
local_materials.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."
source: Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
Found under trees in the wild

local_materials.name: Wolfhook
local_materials.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

potions.name: Desiccant Potion
potions.description:
A kind of potion that boosts Hydro RES and makes one able to withstand highly humid environments.
It is said to act like a desiccant and be highly effective at keeping items dry. It can also be ingested for the same effect.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Hydro RES by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Dustproof Potion
potions.description:
A potion that boosts Geo RES and keeps one from getting bothered by sand and dust.
It has a strange taste not unlike that of magnets. It keeps a traveler clean from all the sand and dust out there.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Geo RES by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Flaming Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Pyro, boosting Pyro DMG.
It is made of materials that gestate Pyro, which serves to draw in Pyro energy more effectively. It also makes the user more fired-up and passionate.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Pyro DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Frosting Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Cryo, boosting Cryo DMG.
It has a chilling sensation when applied, and helps one to better channel Cryo energy. It also helps to keep you cool-headed and calm.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Cryo DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Frostshield Potion
potions.description:
A miraculous potion that boosts Cryo RES and makes one able to withstand extreme cold.
Induces a chilling sensation when drank, but once this sensation spreads throughout the body, the feeling of being cold disappears.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Cryo RES by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Gushing Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Anemo, boosting Anemo DMG.
It has a fragrant smell. It is said that using it during your travels will make you walk as if you're riding on the wind.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Anemo DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Heatshield Potion
potions.description:
A miraculous potion that boosts Pyro RES and makes one able to withstand high heat.
It works not by cooling the body, but by helping the body acclimate to high temperatures.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Pyro RES by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Insulation Potion
potions.description:
A potion that boosts Electro RES and keeps one from getting electro-shocked.
Induces a tingling sensation when drank. It is said to work by filling the body with inversely charged electrical energy, which counteracts the effect of Electro damage.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Electro RES by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Shocking Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG.
It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy — but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Electro DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Streaming Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Hydro, boosting Hydro DMG.
It's a slippery medicine for external use, able to better channel Hydro energy. It has a subtle fragrance.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Hydro DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Unmoving Essential Oil
potions.description:
Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG.
You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Geo DMG by 25% for 300s.

potions.name: Windbarrier Potion
potions.description:
A mysterious potion that boosts Anemo RES and makes one able to withstand strong winds.
It works wonders for adventurers out in the world and is even said to keep the cold away.
potions.effect: Increases all party members' Anemo RES by 25% for 300s.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Bloodjade Branch
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Hatred coursed through the natural streams and kissed the cold moonlight, and from them were these crystalline branches born and grown...
Even though they were severed in battle, these branches steeped in dragon blood rustle as if eternally ill-at-ease.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Crown of Insight
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Dragon Lord's Crown
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Infused with spirit and carved from bedrock, it was born from the mountain's heart to show the strength of the earth to the land amidst monoliths, and its long golden horns are the mark of its ancient strife with an ancient lord.
For a time, this horn was shattered and lost its luster, but now it gleams cold and gold as it sits in your palm.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Dvalin's Claw
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Dvalin's Plume
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it could whip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its former owner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Dvalin's Sigh
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.
His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Gilded Scale
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Across the years as countless generations returned to the mulch of the earth, gold and obsidian embedded themselves into flesh and blood forged from bedrock before spreading and turning into scales.
Searing agony, wordless cries... perhaps they will all vanish when the grudges that spawned them, too, finally come to an end.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Ballad
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Diligence
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Freedom
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Gold
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Prosperity
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Guide to Resistance
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Diligence
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Freedom
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Gold
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Philosophies of Resistance
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Ring of Boreas
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Shadow of the Warrior
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Shard of a Foul Legacy
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.
Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his final moments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Tail of Boreas
talent_lvl_up_materials.description: Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Diligence
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Freedom
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Gold
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Prosperity
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Teachings of Resistance
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

talent_lvl_up_materials.name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
talent_lvl_up_materials.description:
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Bit of Aerosiderite
weapon_primary_materials.description: The coastal nations of Teyvat refer to the region beyond the protection of The Seven as the Dark Sea. It is said that many defeated gods refused to live under the new order of The Seven, so they fled to remote islands and became evil gods. However, their powers came from the same source as Rex Lapis, separate from this all-devouring darkness.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
weapon_primary_materials.description:
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
weapon_primary_materials.description:
The life of a wolf is not without violence, broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
weapon_primary_materials.description:
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Mondstadt

weapon_primary_materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Nostalgia
weapon_primary_materials.description: The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator
weapon_primary_materials.description: The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Chunk of Aerosiderite
weapon_primary_materials.description: When Khaenri'ah was destroyed, a great sinner created endless monsters with dark, alien blood flowing through their veins. They rampaged across the land, destroying all in their paths. They were mutated lifeforms, and the mutations were caused by powers from beyond this world. The black serpentine dragon Durin that attacked Mondstadt was one such mutated being.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
weapon_primary_materials.description: Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Divine Body from Guyun
weapon_primary_materials.description: That which lurks within and animates this relic are the divine remains of lamenting gods. They are unrealized ideals, designs for a prosperous humanity that could never be. They may now lie deep within stone and sea, but they will not go quietly into the night.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Dream of the Dandelion Gladiator
weapon_primary_materials.description:
Vennessa may have been freed from slavery, but she then found herself subject to many other, even greater forms of bondage. What began as a duty to her tribespeople extended to all of Mondstadt, then to the concept of freedom itself, and beyond a point even to the whole world.
What she really hoped for, in truth, was that the world might grow stronger.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator
weapon_primary_materials.description:
It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.
As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Mondstadt

weapon_primary_materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
weapon_primary_materials.description: Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Grain of Aerosiderite
weapon_primary_materials.description: A black meteor once fell beyond Liyue's Sea of Clouds, said to have fallen to vanquish a monster. However, it was stained by powerful tainted blood, so this item no longer possesses the pure power of Rex Lapis.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Liyue

weapon_primary_materials.name: Luminous Sands from Guyun
weapon_primary_materials.description: The stone pillars that tower amid Guyun Stone Forest were once the stone spears Morax used to defeat his enemies. Over time, the gods' substance has seeped into the pillars that pin them down, lending them divine power. The pillars sometimes shed fragments of hatred and curses.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Liyue

weapon_primary_materials.name: Lustrous Stone from Guyun
weapon_primary_materials.description: The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
weapon_primary_materials.description: Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
weapon_primary_materials.description: Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Liyue

weapon_primary_materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
weapon_primary_materials.description: With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
weapon_primary_materials.description: An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Piece of Aerosiderite
weapon_primary_materials.description: Rumors of sea monsters are commonplace in Liyue, since the other shore is an unknown region that lies outside of Teyvat. Without the protection of The Seven, all that lies beyond is unknown chaos. Only power beyond the order of Teyvat is able to stain the power of Rex Lapis black.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Relic from Guyun
weapon_primary_materials.description: The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
weapon_primary_materials.description:
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
weapon_primary_materials.description:
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

weapon_primary_materials.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
weapon_primary_materials.description: The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Mondstadt

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Agent's Sacrificial Knife
weapon_secondary_materials.description: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Chaos Circuit
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no-one is able to make sense of how it worked.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Chaos Core
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Chaos Device
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Dead Ley Line Branch
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Dead Ley Line Leaves
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Fossilized Bone Shard
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Geovishaps all dream of growing into great dragons one day. They see these fossils as dragon bones and greatly cherish them, perhaps because they too hope to attain the dragons' longevity and power.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Fragile Bone Shard
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Although they are quite fragile, they seem to still harbor some indescribable power.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Heavy Horn
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Hunter's Sacrificial Knife
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Inspector's Sacrificial Knife
weapon_secondary_materials.description: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts." No-one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Ley Line Sprout
weapon_secondary_materials.description: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Mist Grass
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.
source: Dropped by Lv. 40+ Fatui Cicin Mages

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
weapon_secondary_materials.description: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
weapon_secondary_materials.description: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.
source: Dropped by Lv. 60+ Fatui Cicin Mages

weapon_secondary_materials.name: Sturdy Bone Shard
weapon_secondary_materials.description: The fragment appears to be quite aged. Despite being dragon-like beasts with no spoken language, they still seem to have some sort of special affection for these bone shards.

weapons.name: Alley Hunter
weapons.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
weapons.bonus: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2/25/3/35/4% every second up to a max of 20/25/30/35/40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4/5/6/7/8% per second until it reaches 0%.

refinements.desc: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2% every second up to a max of 20%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4% per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2.5% every second up to a max of 25%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 5% per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 3% every second up to a max of 30%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 6% per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 3.5% every second up to a max of 35%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 7% per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 4% every second up to a max of 40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 8% per second until it reaches 0%.

weapons.name: Amos' Bow
weapons.description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.
weapons.bonus: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12/15/18/21/24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8/10/12/14/16% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

refinements.desc: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

weapons.name: Apprentice's Notes
weapons.description: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

weapons.name: Aquila Favonia
weapons.description: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.
weapons.bonus: ATK is increased by 20/25/30/35/40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100/115/130/145/160% of ATK and dealing 200/230/260/290/320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

refinements.desc: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.description: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
weapons.bonus: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60/70/80/90/100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80/95/110/125/140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200/240/280/320/360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Dull Blade
weapons.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

weapons.name: Elegy for the End
weapons.description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
weapons.bonus: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60/75/90/105/120. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by 100/125/150/175/200 and increases ATK by 20/25/30/35/40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.bonus: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by 16/20/24/28/32%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by 12/15/18/21/24% and increases ATK by 20/25/30/35/40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.
